survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Home Cleaning Robots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction and experiences with AI-powered home cleaning robots, focusing on usability, performance, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for ease of analysis. Ensure the scale is balanced and neutral.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently with your AI-powered home cleaning robot? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture feature usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently with your AI-powered home cleaning robot? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use your AI-powered home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover the full range of possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use your AI-powered home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your AI-powered home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your AI-powered home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your AI-powered home cleaning robot to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard recommendation scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.
